R Nepal organized Tidyweek -- Data Analysis with R Bootcamp between Sep 20th-23rd,

The participants were from various backgrounds (health, business, academia) and came from outside Kathmandu valley as well.

The data analysis Bootcamp provided participants with a session of Data Analysis process:

-   Basics of R
-   Import Data / Tidying
-   Data Transformation
-   Visualization
-   Communication/ Report
